high_descs: Turn around, move to the clock on the small table left of the bed.
Pick up the clock on the table.
Bring the clock to the left, to the lamp on the left side of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the clock in the light of the lamp on the desk.

high_descs: turn around, go to left bedside table with clock
pick up clock from bedside table
turn left, go to left end of desk with lamp
anns.task_desc: pick up clock, turn on lamp

high_descs: Turn around and go to the night stand to the left of the bed.
Pick up the alarm clock on the night stand.
Turn to your left and go to the far end of the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the back, left corner of the desk.
